results.overview: Deadpool tells the origin story of former Special Forces operative turned mercenary Wade Wilson, who after being subjected to a rogue experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers, adopts the alter ego Deadpool. Armed with his new abilities and a dark, twisted sense of humor, Deadpool hunts down the man who nearly destroyed his life.
results.title: Deadpool

results.overview: Wisecracking mercenary Deadpool battles the evil and powerful Cable and other bad guys to save a boy's life.
results.title: Deadpool 2

results.overview: A kidnapped Fred Savage is forced to endure Deadpool's PG-13 rendition of Deadpool 2 as a Princess Bride-esque story that's full of magic, wonder & zero F's.
results.title: Once Upon a Deadpool

results.overview: Deadpool sees an opportunity to save the day, but it doesn't go entirely as planned.
results.title: Deadpool: No Good Deed

results.original_title: Gettin' Wet on Wet with Deadpool 2
results.overview: A short-parody of "The Joy of Painting" starring Deadpool as Bob Ross.
results.title: Gettin' Wet on Wet with Deadpool 2

results.original_title: Deadpool The Musical 2 - Ultimate Disney Parody
results.overview: That "Merc with a Mouth" just can't. stop. singing. Join the R-rated, NSFW musical mayhem as our singing hero, Deadpool, slays his way through a series of Disney songs and superhero teams, from the X-Men to the Avengers and more, all while piling up a body count that, well, to be honest, we lost count.
results.title: Deadpool The Musical 2 - Ultimate Disney Parody

results.original_title: Deadpool & Black Panther: Back in Red & Black
results.overview: Two classic Marvel Heroes DeadPool and Black Panther team up to cause a little trouble in this fan made short film.
results.title: Deadpool & Black Panther: Back in Red & Black

results.original_title: Deadpool: With Apologies to David Beckham
results.title: Deadpool: With Apologies to David Beckham

results.original_title: Deadpool: From Comics to Screen... to Screen
results.overview: This documentary divided into five segments examines the source and its path to the movies, backstory, special effects story/character areas, cast and performances. It includes notes from Reynolds, Liefeld, Miller, Wernick, Reese, executive producers Aditya Sood and Stan Lee, co-creator/comics writer Fabian Nicieza, producer Simon Kinberg, comics writer Joe Kelly, specialty costume designer Russell Shinkle, makeup designer Bill Corso, production designer Sean Haworth, director of photography Ken Seng, executive producer/unit production manager John J. Kelly, previs supervisor Franck Balson, stunt coordinator Philip J. Silvera, visual effects supervisors Pauline Duvall and Jonathan Rothbart, visual effects producer Annemarie Griggs, 2nd unit director/stunt coordinator Robert Alonzo, special effects coordinator Alex Burdett, utility stunts Regis Harrington, composer Tom Holkenberg, and actors Morena Baccarin, TJ Miller, Brianna Hildebrand, Leslie Uggams, Ed Skrein, and Gina Carano.
results.title: Deadpool: From Comics to Screen... to Screen

results.overview: Who knew the "Merc with a Mouth" could sing?. Check out this fan-made musical mashup of "Deadpool" and "Beauty and the Beast" featuring Wade's own NSFW, mature-audiences version of the classic song "Gaston" from the original musical. *This is a Non-profit unofficial fan-film that is not intended for commercial use. It was made solely for fun. Characters are owned by 20th Century Fox/Marvel Studios and this fan-film is not connected in any way to said companies.*
results.title: Deadpool: The Musical
